kjv: Paul, and Silvanus, and Timotheus, unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ:
web: Paul, Silvanus, and Timothy, to the assembly of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ:
chr: ᏉᎳ, ᎠᎴ ᏌᏱᎳ, ᎠᎴ ᏗᎹᏗ, ᏫᏨᏲᏪᎳᏏ ᏗᏣᏁᎶᏗ ᎢᏣᏓᏡᎬ ᏕᏏᎶᏂᎦ ᎢᏤᎯ ᎤᏁᎳᏅᎯ ᎢᎩᏙᏓ ᎠᎴ ᎤᎬᏫᏳᎯ ᏥᏌ ᎦᎶᏁᏛ ᏕᏣᏁᎶᏛᎢ.

kjv: Grace unto you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
web: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
chr: ᎬᏩᎦᏘᏯ ᎤᏓᏙᎵᏍᏗ ᎨᏒ ᎠᎴ ᏅᏩᏙᎯᏯᏛ ᏕᏥᎧᎿᏩᏗᏙᎮᏍᏗ ᏅᏓᏳᎾᎵᏍᎪᎸᏔᏅᎯ ᎤᏁᎳᏅᎯ ᎢᎩᏙᏓ ᎠᎴ ᎤᎬᏫᏳᎯ ᏥᏌ ᎦᎶᏁᏛ.

kjv: We are bound to thank God always for you, brethren, as it is meet, because that your faith groweth exceedingly, and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth;
web: We are bound to always give thanks to God for you, brothers, even as it is appropriate, because your faith grows exceedingly, and the love of each and every one of you toward one another abounds,
chr: ᎣᎦᏚᏓᎳ ᏂᎪᎯᎸ ᎣᏣᎵᎡᎵᏤᏗᏱ ᎤᏁᎳᏅᎯ ᏂᎯ ᎢᏓᎵᏅᏟ ᎤᎬᏩᎵ, ᏥᏚᏳᎪᏗ ᎾᏍᎩ ᎢᏲᎦᏛᏁᏗᏱ, ᏅᏗᎦᎵᏍᏙᏗᎭ ᎢᏦᎯᏳᏒ ᎤᏣᏘ ᏣᏛᏍᎦ, ᎠᎴ ᏕᏣᏓᎨᏳᏒ ᏂᏥᎥ ᎢᏥᏏᏴᏫᎭ ᎨᏒ ᎤᏣᏘ ᏥᎧᏁᏉᎦ;

kjv: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure:
web: so that we ourselves boast about you in the assemblies of God for your perseverance and faith in all your persecutions and in the afflictions which you endure.
chr: ᎾᏍᎩ ᎢᏳᏍᏗ ᎠᏴ ᎣᎬᏒ ᎣᏣᏢᏈᏍᎦ ᎢᏨᏁᎢᏍᏗᏍᎬ ᏧᎾᏁᎶᏗ ᏚᎾᏓᏡᏩᏍᏗᏒ ᎤᏁᎳᏅᎯ ᏧᏤᎵᎦ, ᎾᏍᎩ ᏗᏨᏂᏗᏳ ᎨᏒ ᎠᎴ ᎢᏦᎯᏳ ᎨᏒ ᏂᎦᎥ ᎤᏕᏯᏙᏗ ᎠᎴ ᎠᎩᎵᏯ ᎢᏥᎷᏤᎲᎢ;

kjv: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God, that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God, for which ye also suffer:
web: This is an obvious sign of the righteous judgment of God, to the end that you may be counted worthy of God’s Kingdom, for which you also suffer.
chr: ᎾᏍᎩ ᎬᏂᎨᏒ ᎢᎬᏁᏒ ᏥᎩ ᎤᏁᎳᏅᎯ ᏚᏳᎪᏛ ᏧᏭᎪᏛᏗ ᏧᏭᎪᏙᏗ ᎨᏒᎢ, ᎾᏍᎩ ᏰᎵ ᎤᏁᎳᏅᎯ ᎤᏤᎵᎪᎯ ᎢᏤᎯ ᎡᏤᎵᏎᏗᏱ, ᎾᏍᎩ ᎾᏍᏉ ᎤᎬᏩᎵ ᏥᏥᎩᎵᏲᎦ.

kjv: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you;
web: For it is a righteous thing with God to repay affliction to those who afflict you,
chr: ᏅᏗᎦᎵᏍᏙᏗᎭ ᏚᏳᎪᏛᎢ ᎤᏁᎳᏅᎯ ᏧᎫᏴᏓᏁᏗᏱ ᎠᎩᎵᏲᎢᏍᏗ ᎨᏒ ᎾᏍᎩ Ꮎ ᎨᏥᎩᎵᏲᎢᏍᏗᏍᎩ;

kjv: And to you who are troubled rest with us, when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels,
web: and to give relief to you who are afflicted with us when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven with his mighty angels in flaming fire,
chr: ᏂᎯᏃ ᎡᏥᎩᎵᏲᎢᏍᏗᏍᎩ, ᎠᏣᏪᏐᎸᏍᏙᏗ ᎨᏒ ᎡᎦᎫᏴᏓᏁᏗᏱ, ᎾᎯᏳ ᎤᎬᏫᏳᎯ ᏥᏌ ᎦᎸᎶ ᏅᏓᏳᏓᎴᏅᎯ ᎬᏂᎨᏒ ᎾᎬᏁᎸᎭ ᎠᏁᎮᏍᏗ ᏧᎾᎵᏂᎩᏛ ᏧᏤᎵ ᏗᏂᎧᎿᏩᏗᏙᎯ,

kjv: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God, and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ:
web: punishing those who don’t know God, and to those who don’t obey the Good News of our Lord Jesus,
chr: ᎠᏥᎸ ᎠᏓᏪᎵᎩᏍᎩ ᎤᏄᏬᏍᏕᏍᏗ ᏓᎩᎵᏲᎢᏍᏗᏍᎨᏍᏗ ᎾᏍᎩ Ꮎ ᏂᎬᏩᎦᏔᎲᎾ ᎤᏁᎳᏅᎯ, ᎠᎴ ᏄᏃᎯᏳᏒᎾ ᎣᏍᏛ ᎧᏃᎮᏛ ᎢᎦᏤᎵ ᎤᎬᏫᏳᎯ ᏥᏌ ᎦᎶᏁᏛ ᎤᏤᎵᎦ.

kjv: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord, and from the glory of his power;
web: who will pay the penalty: eternal destruction from the face of the Lord and from the glory of his might,
chr: ᎾᏍᎩ ᎨᏥᏍᏛᏗᏍᏙᏗ ᎨᏎᏍᏗ ᎨᎬᏓᏁᏗ ᏫᎾᏍᏛᎾ ᎠᏓᏛᏗᏍᎩ ᎤᎬᏫᏳᎯ ᎠᎦᏔᎲ ᏅᏓᏳᏓᎴᏅᎯ, ᎠᎴ ᎦᎸᏉᏗᏳ ᎤᎵᏂᎩᏗᏳ ᎨᏒᎢ,

kjv: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired in all them that believe (because our testimony among you was believed) in that day.
web: when he comes in that day to be glorified in his saints and to be admired among all those who have believed, because our testimony to you was believed.
chr: ᎾᎯᏳ ᏧᏤᎵ ᎤᎾᏓᏅᏘ ᎬᏩᎸᏉᏙᏗᏱ ᎤᎬᏩᎵ ᎦᎷᏨᎭ, ᎠᎴ ᎤᏍᏆᏂᎪᏗ ᏧᏓᏅᏓᏗᏍᏙᏗᏱ ᎾᏂᎥ ᎾᏍᎩ Ꮎ ᎬᏬᎯᏳᎲᏍᎩ ᎾᎯᏳ ᎢᎦ ᎨᏎᏍᏗ, ᏅᏗᎦᎵᏍᏙᏗᏍᎨᏍᏗ ᎪᎯᏳᏅᎯ ᎨᏒ ᎣᎩᏃᎮᎸ ᎢᏤᎲᎢ.

kjv: Wherefore also we pray always for you, that our God would count you worthy of this calling, and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness, and the work of faith with power:
web: To this end we also pray always for you that our God may count you worthy of your calling, and fulfill every desire of goodness and work of faith with power,
chr: ᎾᏍᎩ ᎢᏳᏍᏗ ᎾᏍᏉ ᏂᎪᎯᎸ ᎣᏣᏓᏙᎵᏍᏗᏍᎪ ᎢᏨᏯᏅᏓᏗᏍᎪ, ᎾᏍᎩ ᎣᎦᏁᎳᏅᎯ ᎤᏓᏯᏅᏗ ᎨᏒ ᎢᏥᏯᏅᏔᏅᎯ ᎢᏳᎵᏍᏙᏗᏱ, ᎠᎴ ᎤᏍᏆᏗᏍᏗᏱ ᏂᎦᏛ ᎣᏍᏛ ᎤᏰᎸᏗ ᎨᏒ ᏅᏓᏳᏓᎴᏅᎯ ᎤᏓᏅᏘᏳ ᎨᏒᎢ, ᎠᎴ ᎪᎯᏳᏗ ᎨᏒ ᏧᎸᏫᏍᏓᏁᏗ ᎬᏔᏅᎯ ᎤᎵᏂᎩᏛ ᎨᏒᎢ;

kjv: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you, and ye in him, according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.
web: that the name of our Lord Jesus may be glorified in you, and you in him, according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.
chr: ᎾᏍᎩ ᎢᏳᏩᏂᏐᏗᏱ ᏚᏙᎥ ᎢᎦᏤᎵ ᎤᎬᏫᏳᎯ ᏥᏌ ᏓᎶᏁᏛ ᎦᎸᏉᏗᏳ ᎢᏳᎵᏍᏙᏗᏱ ᏂᎯ ᎢᏨᏂᏌᏛ, ᎠᎴ ᏂᎯ ᎦᎸᏉᏗᏳ ᎢᏰᏨᏁᏗᏱ ᎾᏍᎩ ᎢᏳᏩᏂᏌᏛ, ᎾᏍᎩᏯ ᏄᏍᏛ ᎬᏩᎦᏘᏯ ᎤᏓᏙᎵᏍᏗ ᎨᏒ ᎢᎦᏁᎳᏅᎯ, ᎠᎴ ᎤᎬᏫᏳᎯ ᏥᏌ ᎦᎶᏁᏛ.
